description: This table contains data recorded in the activities of daily living section of social history contacts entered in the patient's chart during a clinical system encounter. Note: This table is designed to hold a patient's history over time; however, it is most typically implemented to only extract the latest patient history contact.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: A unique serial number for this encounter. This number is unique across all patients and encounters in the system.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: HX_ADL_QUESTION_ID
columns.description: Stores the link to the unique ID of the ADL question.

columns.name: HX_ADL_QUESTION_ID_RECORD_NAME
columns.description: The name of the Visit Navigator (VN) History Template Definition (LQH) record.

columns.name: HX_ADL_RESPONSE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column stores the category value (1, 2 or 3) of the response to ADL questions. 


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No


Not Asked

columns.name: HX_ADL_COMMENTS
columns.description: Holds comments for Activities of Daily Living (ADL) questions.
